item.title: Fork Information
item.description: Many times I have to search for repositories at GitHub which may fill a coding requirment I have. During this process I have realized that I also go on looking at the forked versions of a repository in order to find something that matches my exact requirment. This app helps me with this process by automatically fetching the forks of a given repository and listing how far or behind they are from the parent fork.
